subject: Re: FW: Cozze website - New products
preview: Hi Bonnie,  Hope you're well.  This should be fixed now. Kindly check if that's all good on your end.  Let us know if you have any further queries.

full_threads.body:
Hi Bonnie,

Hope you're well.

This should be fixed now. Kindly check if that's all good on your end.

Let us know if you have any further queries.

Hi team,

It looks like the data still isn't feeding through to our Pronto system correctly due to the vat_number column missing:



Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



0408 331 966



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

Hi Bonnie,

Our apologies for any inconvenience this has caused.

Our team has confirmed that it has been fixed.

Kindly have a check and feel free to let us know if you have any further queries.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Joy T

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

Can you please see the below issue we are currently having with feeding orders through to our Pronto system. The SFTP file is not accurate.

Can you please urgently fix this for any future orders. Please do not push these through again once fixed, as we are already manually processing them.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan
Marketing Communications Manager


bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

0408 331 966

Customer Service: 1300 360 211

From: Sopheat Sor <ssor@mayohardware.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, September 10, 2025 2:09 PM
To: Bonnie Sudirwan <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au>; Sonia Di Biase <sdibiase@mayohardware.com.au>
Cc: Paul Beasley <pbeasley@mayohardware.com.au>; Leah Mills <LMills@mayohardware.com.au>
Subject: RE: Cozze website - New products


Hi Bonnie,


Those orders have come across from SFTP but as you can see from the screenshot below which I have compared between Cozze and Spidertarp etc. formats and column T of Cozze format should be "vat_number" so Cozze format has a missing "vat_number" in column T so could you ask WolfIQ to fix Cozze format.


Sonia, to avoid the delay please manually process those orders.





Sopheat Sor
 ​​​​
Business Systems Administrator

www.mayohardware.com.au
